snippet: The Department of Interior plans to announce a 20-year moratorium on new mining claims in a million-acre buffer zone around the Grand Canyon.
abstract: The Department of Interior plans to announce a 20-year moratorium on new mining claims in a million-acre buffer zone around the Grand Canyon.
lead_paragraph: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar is expected to announce on Monday that he has approved a 20-year moratorium on new uranium mining claims in a million-acre buffer zone around the Grand Canyon.

headline.main: U.S. to Ban New Uranium Mining Near Grand Canyon
